{{ title() }}

Alerts

@if (showSuccessAlert()) { } @if (showErrorAlert()) { }

Input Fields (Reactive Forms)

@if (userForm.controls.username.value) { Value: {{ userForm.controls.username.value }} } @if (userForm.controls.username.invalid && userForm.controls.username.touched) { Username is required }
@if (userForm.controls.email.value) { Value: {{ userForm.controls.email.value }} } @if (userForm.controls.email.invalid && userForm.controls.email.touched) { Valid email is required }
@if (userForm.controls.password.invalid && userForm.controls.password.touched) { Password must be at least 6 characters }

@if (selectedCountry()) { Selected: {{ selectedCountry() }} }
@if (selectedRole()) { Selected: {{ selectedRole() }} }

Select Sizes

Cards

This is the card body content. You can put any content here using ng-content.

This card has an elevated style for emphasis.

Cards can display images at the top.

Built with Angular {{ '21' }} and UI Components Library
